longBusinessSummary: Hexagon Composites ASA, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells composite pressure cylinders and fuel systems for mobility, industrial, and consumer applications in Norway, Europe, North America, South-East Asia, the Middle East, and internationally. The company operates through Agility, Hexagon Purus, Hexagon Mobile Pipeline & Other, and Hexagon Ragasco LPG segments. It provides compressed natural gas, liquid natural gas, and propane hydrogen fuel systems, as well as Type 4 composite cylinders for medium- and heavy-duty commercial vehicles. The company also develops and supplies high-pressure composite cylinders and solutions for a range of hydrogen applications, as well as compressed natural gas (CNG) fueled light-duty vehicles; and high-pressure composite storage and transportation cylinders and modules for CNG and biogas. In addition, it manufactures low-pressure composite cylinders for propane gas. The company serves the aerospace, automotive, industrial gas, liquefied petroleum gas, marine, mining, oil and gas, rail, and utilities industries. Hexagon Composites ASA is headquartered in Ãlesund, Norway.
